article:
Leaf was in love with Wind. Wind rocked  Leaf to   _   and shook her awake every day, and always told Leaf about the beautiful places he had been,   _   her feel excited.
"I will never leave you,   _   you make me happy," Leaf whispered to the gentle Wind.
    When Tree heard these   _   he laughed and said, " Remember that you will wither , become brown, and be   blown away   by Wind."
    Leaf was   _   to hear this. "That's a lie!" she cried. She had heard the stories of   _    leaves turn old and die, but didn't   _   them.
    Time passed, and Leaf grew bigger and stronger, but then came the period of   _   yellow and old.
    "Your   _   has come. You'll be blown away by Wind and become nothing but dust."
    Leaf laughed. "Your words cannot   _  . Others may be sad,   _   I won't. I choose to be happy with my fate"
    Tree was angry, "You'll regret."
    But one day, when Leaf actually was carried away by Wind, she laughed   _   the air. "Oh, I'm   _   with Wind!" Instead of feeling   _  , she felt free. She could   _   the soft song of Wind, and felt herself flying higher and higher.
    When springtime came again, Leaf passed by Tree and heard him   _   the young leaves about their   _  . But Leaf whispered to them, "Listen, my children. It doesn't have to be your fate. If you choose to be   _  , you will soar  into the sky. But if you bend to your fate, you will be   _   forever."
